org.activiti.crystalball.simulator

类 SimulationRunContext

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.activiti.crystalball.simulator.SimulationRunContext

  • public abstract class SimulationRunContext
extends Object
    Context in which simulation is run. It contains references to process engine, event calendar.
    作者:
    martin.grofcik
